item.title: Obligatory First Post
item.description: This article marks the beginning of my blog! Woohoo! Maybe in a couple of years when I have more posts in here, you will find this page. It will look empty; it will be out of place; but it sure will be deep :D

item.title: About
item.description: About me Hiya! My name is Frank, and I LOVE tech! Most of the time, I let my interests fuel my passion for my work; which ends up taking me down some deep rabbit holes. I’ve put on many hats in the past working from the bottom of the stack developing PCBs, to developming embedded applications and fiddling with the Linux Kernel, to (now) working as a cloud architect developing and administering infrastructure and automation.
